reviewText: Leslie Sansone has been around for a long time and she knows her stuff.  I like this walk DVD--it's easier than Jane Fonda's, but still gets your heart pumping, which is the goal.  Leslie even has the viewer take his/her pulse 3 times during the workout.  If you can stand and walk, you can do this one.  Only about 30 minutes from start to finish.At the beginning, Leslie's laughter is a little disconcerting--it sounds pretty fake, like she's nervous, working out with this crowd of people.  Go with it, because the workout is worth it.  But it is annoying the first time you hear it.
summary: I like this walk DVD--it's easier than Jane Fonda's
Title: N/A

reviewText: I didn't use this video myself as I bought it for my mother who just turned 80. She has a few other Leslie Sansone DVDs but said this one fits her activity level better. Easier for her to follow and at a slower pace. She uses is several times a week.
Title: N/A

reviewText: I bought this for my 83 year old mother. Before sending it to her, I tried it and enjoyed the workout. It's about 30 minutes and easy to follow.
Title: N/A

reviewText: When you need a good work-out and a good place to start, this works.  It's not just for seniors either.
summary: Just right for a quick work-out!
Title: N/A

reviewText: Leslie Sansone had a different walk for seniors (or 40's) on VHS but i cannot find it anywhere.  This is the closest i've found.  It is a terrific workout - and i have to use my walker to participate.
Title: N/A
